data.text: The staffs are very accommodating. The room was spacious that we were able to make our bonding experience memorable. The hotel is connected to Al Ghurair Mall which makes is accessible to everything. The facilities are clean and well maintained.
data.title: Great Experience

data.text: We had a wonderful stay and have enjoyed the quiet and comfortable staycation in the spacious 2-bedroom apartment.  I booked a one-bedroom apartment but was upgraded to a two-bedroom place because it was my birthday staycation. The apartment is very spacious with all the amenities you can find in a living space. It has a separate laundry room too.  The bedrooms are also huge and the master bedroom even has a walk-in closet. The apartment is perfect for families or groups of 3-4 persons.  Staff are all friendly and very courteous. I had the same very satisfying experience even on the first time I had stayed in Swissotel. And this staycation was the 2nd. Great location too as it is connected to the Al Ghurair Mall in Deira. You can park for free in the mall's parking space or use the metro to get around the city. Taxis are available too. The breakfast buffet is nice and have plenty of selections.  Overall, our stay is very satisfying.
data.title: Great location, comfortable stay

data.text: Good location, large apartment, the hotel is connected to a shopping mall, Valet Parking is available but there is a delay in the services. We enjoy our stay , smooth check in and quick check out. Breakfast is acceptable but it was busy after 9:30AM.
data.title: Awesome location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Wail-Almaimani,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We appreciate learning the areas you were satisfied. However, we have noted as well the concerns you have mentioned. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences you had faced. Rest assured that we will check on this for the needed action to apply. Thank you for bringing your concern to our attention.

Hope to welcome you back and experience the actions implemented.

Sincerely,

Amal El Ansari
General Manager
Swissotel Al Ghurair & Swissotel Living Al Ghurair Dubai
owner_response.author: Amal El Ansari

data.text:
Close to a lot of attractions, shopping centers, beaches, and airport, easy access to all parts of the town by taxi and train
Rooms and apartments are spacious and clean 
Excellent breakfast spread: Tom was great in the dining room
Reception staff are warm and welcoming especially Patrick
Boutique ran by Nada is well stocked and reasonably priced items. Nada was very welcoming and helpful and made us happy we chose to stay at the hotel. Nada and her staff are great ambassadors of the hotel
The concierge staff were awesome in their services. Thank you all for making our stay memorable 
I will highly recommend this hotel to family and friends
Close
data.title: Location! Location! Location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear angela o,

We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at the Swissotel Al Ghurair. 

It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback. I will share your comments with our team especially with Tom, Patrick, Nada and team. I am sure that this feedback will serve as an encouragement to them and to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services.

Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be as pleasant as the previous one.

Sincerely,

Amal El Ansari
General Manager
Swissotel Al Ghurair & Swissotel Living Al Ghurair Dubai
owner_response.author: Amal El Ansari

data.text:
Good location, very helpful staff. My only complaint is that they need to replenish items in the kitchen needed for cooking and storage of food.
Internet often shows weak internet signal. Not sure if this is the hotel system or the internet provider
data.title: Golf trip

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear rogermX6827MN, 

Thank you for choosing Swissôtel Living Al Ghurair for your golf trip and for taking the time to share your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had a good stay and experienced excellent service from our staff. We understand your concern regarding the kitchen items and apologize for any inconvenience caused. Your feedback about inventory management is duly noted and we will consider implementing measures to ensure that the kitchen items are properly accounted for. We appreciate your suggestion about charging guests for missing or damaged items and will evaluate its feasibility. Thank you once again for your valuable feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the future. 

Sincerely,

Amal El Ansari
General Manager
Swissotel Al Ghurair & Swissotel Living Al Ghurair
owner_response.author: Amal El Ansari
